languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time. This weak point is never located on the opposite side of the ship.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Авгуры сканируют вражеский корабль, чтобы выявить уязвимые места.
Атака в уязвимое место наносит +35% урона. Одновременно может быть выявлено только одно уязвимое место.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Восстановление{/g}: случайное, 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All damage dealt to the weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1–3 rounds at random.</indent>

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time. This weak point is never located on the opposite side of the ship.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time. This weak point is never located on the opposite side of the ship.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time. This weak point is never located on the opposite side of the ship.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
Авгуры сканируют вражеский корабль, чтобы найти его уязвимые места.
Весь {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}, наносимый по уязвимым местам, увеличивается на 35%. Единовременно может быть выделено только одно уязвимое место. Уязвимое место никогда не проявляется на противоположной стороне корабля.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time. The weak point never highlights on the opposite side of the ship.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Авгуры сканируют вражеский корабль, чтобы выявить уязвимые места.
Атака в уязвимое место наносит +35% урона. Одновременно может быть выявлено только одно уязвимое место.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Восстановление{/g}: случайное, 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.</indent>

Авгуры сканируют вражеский корабль, чтобы выявить уязвимые места.
Атака в уязвимое место наносит +35% урона. Одновременно может быть выявлено только одно уязвимое место.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Восстановление{/g}: случайное, 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Die Auguren des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} scannen ein feindliches Schiff, um seine Schwachpunkte zu markieren.
Der gesamte {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} gegen einen Schwachpunkt wird um +35 % erhöht. Es kann immer nur ein Schwachpunkt markiert werden. Dieser Schwachpunkt befindet sich niemals auf der gegenüberliegenden Seite des Schiffes.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: Zufällige Rundenanzahl <u>(1 bis 3)</u>.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time. This weak point is never located on the opposite side of the ship.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Auguren scannen ein Feindschiff, um seine Schwachpunkte hervorzuheben..
Der gesamte Schaden gegen einen Schwachpunkt wird um +35 % erhöht. Es kann jeweils nur eine Schwachstelle hervorgehoben werden.
<indent=5 %>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}: zufällig 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Les augures du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} scannent un vaisseau ennemi pour mettre en évidence ses points faibles.
Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés aux points faibles augmentent de 35 %. Un seul point faible peut être mis en évidence à la fois. Ce point faible n'est jamais situé de l'autre côté du vaisseau.
<indent=5%>Temps de recharge : <u>(de 1 à 3)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time. This weak point is never located on the opposite side of the ship.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Les Augures scannent un vaisseau ennemi pour mettre en évidence ses points faibles.
Tous les dégâts infligés aux points faibles augmentent de +35 %. Un seul point faible peut être mis en évidence à la fois.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Délai de récupération{/g} : 1 à 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (aléatoire).</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}使用俄歇矩阵扫描敌舰，寻找弱点。
对弱点进行的所有攻击，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高35%。每次扫描只能发现一处弱点，此弱点不会出现在背对我方舰船的一侧。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time. This weak point is never located on the opposite side of the ship.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
使用俄歇矩阵扫描敌舰，寻找弱点。
对弱点进行的所有攻击，造成的伤害都会提高35%。每次扫描只能寻找一处弱点。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}：随机一到三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>

languages.text:
Los augures de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} analizan una nave enemiga para buscar sus puntos débiles.
Todo {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido a un punto débil aumenta un +35 %. Solo se puede resaltar un punto débil a la vez. El punto débil nunca está en el lado opuesto de la nave.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time. This weak point is never located on the opposite side of the ship.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Los augures escanean una nave enemiga para resaltar sus puntos débiles.
Todo el daño infligido al punto débil aumenta un +35 %. Solo se puede resaltar un punto débil a la vez.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Tiempo de recuperación{/g}: 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, aleatorio.</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}のスキャナーが敵艦の弱点をスキャンする。
弱点に対する全ての{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が35％増加する。一度にハイライトされる弱点は一箇所だけ。この弱点は船の反対側には絶対に表示されない。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：<u>(1～3)</u>ラウンド（ランダム）</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time. This weak point is never located on the opposite side of the ship.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
占者は敵船をスキャンし弱点をハイライトする。
弱点に対する全てのダメージが35％増加する。一度にハイライトされる弱点は一箇所だけ。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}： 1-3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}（ランダム）</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisinin{/g} alametleri, bir düşman gemisini tarayarak zayıf noktalarını açığa çıkarır.
Zayıf noktalara verilen {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasarlar{/g} +%35 artar. Bir seferde yalnızca bir zayıf nokta açığa çıkarılabilir. Bu zayıf nokta, asla geminin aksi tarafında olmaz.
<indent=5%>Dolum Süresi: Rastgele <u>(1 ila 3)</u> raunt.</indent>

All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +35%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time. This weak point is never located on the opposite side of the ship.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
